name.namePart: (AUTestingRecords2) Simple Scholix Source Collection With 1 reverse relatedObject principalInvestigator creator, dc.available date, a Single Identifier and Single RelatedInfo Publication.Source is reverse relatedObject related to party with the same name as group attribute. Publisher id should be that of the related party.

collection.description: Expected Result: A single Link Info Package with a link from the collection doi identifier to the publication uri identifier. Single creator from reverse relation. Source is reverse relatedObject related to party with the same name as group attribute. Publisher id should be that of the related party.
